title: Binance’s Bitcoin Trading Volume Plunges 57% as Regulatory Pressure Mounts
description: As legal challenges against Binance mount, the average spot BTC trading volume on the platform has decreased 57% since Sep. 1

title: Binance.US Legal Battle Takes a Twist, Judge Rejects SEC’s Inspection Request
description:
The legal case between the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and crypto exchange Binance took an unexpected turn as the SEC failed to convince a judge to let officials inspect Binance.US’s software.
